name: London Drawing
description: London Drawing constitutes a professional collaboration offering diverse creative drawing workshops and events across London. Suitable for all skill levels, from beginners to advanced, these sessions include drop-in classes and online options to foster artistic confidence.
summary: Professional creative drawing workshops and events across London for all skill levels.

name: Hampstead Life Drawing
description: Weekly life drawing at The Old White Bear Pub in Hampstead Village. Friendly, inclusive sessions for all abilities, featuring dynamic poses and provided materials.
summary: Weekly friendly life drawing sessions at The Old White Bear Pub in Hampstead.

name: Love2Sketch
description: Friendly, untutored drop-in life drawing at The Selkirk in Tooting. Features varied models including burlesque themes, suitable for all levels with materials provided.
summary: Friendly, untutored drop-in life drawing at The Selkirk in Tooting with varied models.

name: Sevenoaks Drawing Group
description: Based at Sevenoaks Art Club, welcoming individuals of all skill levels to friendly sessions with varied programs including life models.
summary: Friendly sessions at Sevenoaks Art Club welcoming all skill levels.

name: Mandie Wilde
description: Co-founder of Open Ealing, offering creative life drawing classes for all levels, from beginners to refresher sessions with professional models.
summary: Creative life drawing classes locally in Ealing for all levels.

name: Freya’s Fast Poses – Creative Life Drawing
description: Creative life drawing sessions led by artist and musician Freya at Dulwich Art Group, offering both in-person and online participation.
summary: Creative life drawing sessions led by artist Freya at Dulwich Art Group.

name: Drink & Draw at The Grosvenor W7
description: Casual Wednesday evening drop-in sessions at The Grosvenor pub in Hanwell, run by Vicky Saumarez. Suitable for all levels.
summary: Casual weekly drop-in life drawing at The Grosvenor pub in Hanwell.

name: Life Drawing Art
description: Weekly Life Drawing sessions at Homerton Library, welcoming all levels.
summary: Weekly Life Drawing sessions at Homerton Library.

name: (ELSC) East London Stripper Collective
description: Erotic art life drawing class where participants can draw strippers performing and pole dancing, challenging stereotypes and stigma.
summary: Erotic art life drawing class featuring strippers and pole dancing.

name: Adrian Dutton Life Drawing
description: Friendly life drawing sessions in East London with guidance and creative exercises suitable for enhancing skills.
summary: Friendly guided life drawing sessions in East London.

name: North London Life Drawing
description: Classes for beginners and experienced artists in a relaxed atmosphere at venues like The Post Bar, with materials provided.
summary: Relaxed life drawing classes for all levels in North London.

name: 2b Or not 2b
description: POC-led life drawing collective celebrating marginalized bodies, offering inclusive workshops for all levels.
summary: POC-led inclusive life drawing collective celebrating marginalized bodies.

name: Covent Garden Life Drawing
description: Informal, untutored sessions in a supportive atmosphere led by Silvina, suitable for all skill levels.
summary: Informal, supportive untutored life drawing sessions in Covent Garden.

name: London Bridge Life Drawing
description: Relaxed drop-in sessions near London Bridge Station welcoming all abilities, with varying models and poses.
summary: Relaxed drop-in life drawing sessions near London Bridge Station.

name: Leytonstone Life Drawing
description: Community-organized, friendly class with a life model, free materials, and optional guidance, catering to all abilities.
summary: Friendly community-organized life drawing in Leytonstone.

name: Camberwell Life Drawing
description: Relaxed, friendly, and bohemian atmosphere for creating art, featuring varied models and poses.
summary: Relaxed, bohemian life drawing sessions in Camberwell.

name: Soho Life Drawing
description: Accessible and supportive Thursday classes providing a welcoming space for all, from beginners to professionals.
summary: Accessible and supportive weekly life drawing classes in Soho.

name: Hesketh Hubbard Art Society
description: Prestigious life drawing society at Mall Galleries offering untutored sessions with professional models.
summary: Prestigious life drawing society sessions at Mall Galleries.

name: Art of Isolation
description: Dynamic, mixed-use art space in South East London hosting weekly life drawing sessions and exhibitions.
summary: Weekly life drawing sessions at Art of Isolation in South East London.

name: Stone Life Drawing
description: Monthly in-person sessions in Leytonstone and weekly sessions at Good Shepherd Studio.
summary: Monthly and weekly life drawing sessions in Leytonstone.

name: Scottish Borders Life Drawing
description: Worldwide online life drawing club facilitating over 350 sessions with models from 50+ countries.
summary: Global online life drawing club with models from over 50 countries.

name: Bare Life Drawing
description: London's fastest-growing inclusive group offering events across various venues, suitable for all levels.
summary: Inclusive life drawing events across various London venues.

name: Croydon Life Drawing Group
description: Long-running group meeting twice monthly for untutored drop-in sessions at East Croydon United Reform Church.
summary: Twice-monthly untutored drop-in life drawing in Croydon.

name: Ciro’s Life Drawing
description: Fortnightly in-person sessions at The Ivories, known for being a source of work for exhibitions.
summary: Fortnightly in-person life drawing sessions at The Ivories.

name: Beehive Pub Tottenham
description: Regular Thursday life drawing classes in the function room of The Beehive, a Grade II listed pub in Tottenham, run by Tottenham Art Classes.
summary: Regular Thursday life drawing classes at The Beehive Pub in Tottenham.

name: Kilburn Life Drawing
description: Weekly untutored sessions on Tuesdays at North London Tavern led by artist Kinga Markus, suitable for all levels.
summary: Weekly untutored life drawing on Tuesdays in Kilburn.

name: Life Drawing at Jazzbourne
description: A delightful evening event in London combining art, drinks, and jazz, offering untutored figure drawing sessions with theatrical lighting and a relaxed atmosphere.
summary: Art, drinks, and jazz combined in untutored figure drawing sessions.

name: Life Drawing with Anna at Artinc
description: Monthly untutored sessions in Isleworth suitable for all skill levels, including materials and snacks.
summary: Monthly untutored life drawing sessions in Isleworth.

name: Life Drawing at the Estorick
description: Untutored life drawing sessions with professional models at the Estorick Collection of Modern Italian Art, welcoming beginners and experienced artists.
summary: Untutored life drawing at the Estorick Collection.

name: Drop-in Portrait Drawing and Painting Sessions
description: Untutored Monday evening sessions providing a welcoming environment to practice portraiture with a long pose and different model each week.
summary: Untutored Monday evening portrait drawing sessions.

name: Thamesmead Life Drawing
description: Guided, drop-in untutored life drawing session in Thamesmead, South East London, founded by artist Jamie Zubairi. Suitable for all levels with guidance available.
summary: Guided drop-in life drawing sessions in Thamesmead.

name: Neon Naked Life Drawing
description: Immersive art experience creating glowing, psychedelic artwork using neon materials and UV-illuminated models. Fun, upbeat atmosphere suitable for all levels.
summary: Immersive UV neon life drawing experience.
